Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/St. Louis
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
